title: Free the artist
tags: how to unlock free the artist
content:
nd with sufficient charisma, Brem will concede that the artist's recognition could be a concern. He provides you with the artist and you can engage in conversation with the artist, Oskar Fevras. Initially assuming you bought him, he inquires about the price but eventually dismisses the question and introduces himself. You can reply with:

You're not known to me. And I'm [name]. Great. When do I get my reward? Don't worry. 'The Oskar Fevras' didn't cost me a coin. What plans do you have with your
